mapper.select:
select
, (select name from xt_organization where id = u.organization_id) organization_name from xt_user u

select
, (select name from xt_organization where id = u.organization_id) organization_name, (SELECT code_value FROM xt_code WHERE TYPE='ZJZLID' AND code_key =u.certificate_type_id) certificate_name from xt_user u where login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and password= #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT u.*, org.`name` organization_name, xc.code_value certificate_name, org.id AS organizationId, org.p_id FROM xt_user u
LEFT JOIN xt_role r ON u.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN xt_organization org ON org.id = u.organization_id LEFT JOIN xt_code xc ON xc.code_key= u.certificate_type_id LEFT JOIN ba_area ia on ia.organization_id = org.id
WHERE 1 = 1 and u.type is not null
and ${dataAuth}
and u.login_name like '%${login_name}%'
and u.real_name like '%${real_name}%'
and u.job_title like '%${job_title}%'
and u.mobile like '%${mobile}%'
and u.certificate_type_id like '%${certificate_type_id}%'
and u.certificate_no like '%${certificate_no}%'
and org.name like '%${organization_name}%'
and org.type like '%${organization_type}%'
and u.is_active like '%${isActive}%'
and u.created_time >=#{start_date}
and u.created_time <=#{end_date}
and r.id = #{role}
GROUP BY u.id order by created_time desc limit ${pageStart},${rows}
